trans-unit.source: Represents information about a specific cell in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta le informazioni su una cella specifica un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This structure provides information about the cell and the data item associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Questa struttura fornisce informazioni sulla cella e l'elemento dati associato alla cella.

trans-unit.source: It is used instead of a reference to the actual <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell> container when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> gets a cell; for example, in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Viene utilizzato invece un riferimento a effettivi <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell>contenitore quando la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>Ottiene una cella; ad esempio, nel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> structure for the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"> </xref> struttura per la cella specificata.

trans-unit.source: This constructor associates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo> with the specific <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> instance that owns the cell container.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore consente di associare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo>con la specifica <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>istanza a cui appartiene il contenitore della cella.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo>

trans-unit.source: The cell for which information is to be generated.
trans-unit.target: La cella per la quale sono possibile generare informazioni.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> structure using the specified data item and column.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"> </xref> struttura utilizzando un elemento di dati specificato e la colonna.

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not associate the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo> with a specific <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> instance.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore non associa il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo>con uno specifico <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>istanza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo>

trans-unit.source: The data item for the row that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento di dati per la riga contenente la cella.

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: La colonna contenente la cella.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la colonna contenente la cella.

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: La colonna contenente la cella.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified object is equal to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Indica se l'oggetto specificato è uguale all'istanza corrente.

trans-unit.source: This method compares the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> that owns the cell container.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente di confrontare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>proprietà, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A>proprietà e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>che possiede il contenitore della cella.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da confrontare con l'istanza corrente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the comparison object represents the same cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'oggetto di confronto rappresenta la stessa cella; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un codice hash per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the structure.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash per la struttura.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the structure holds valid information.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la struttura contiene informazioni valide.

trans-unit.source: This property verifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> property is not <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> property is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà verifica che il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A>proprietà non è <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>proprietà non è `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the structure has valid information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la struttura contiene informazioni valide; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item for the row that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento dati per la riga contenente la cella.

trans-unit.source: The data item for the row that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento di dati per la riga contenente la cella.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Indica se due <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"> </xref> istanze sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: This operator compares the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> that owns the cell container.
trans-unit.target: Questo operatore confronta la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>proprietà, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A>, proprietà e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>che possiede il contenitore della cella.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: La prima struttura da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: La seconda struttura da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two structures represent the same cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se le due strutture rappresentano la stessa cella; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"></xref> instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Indica se due <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo"> </xref> istanze non sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: This operator compares the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> that owns the cell container.
trans-unit.target: Questo operatore confronta la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>proprietà, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A>, proprietà e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>che possiede il contenitore della cella.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Column%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: La prima struttura da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: La seconda struttura da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two structures do not represent the same cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se le due strutture non rappresentano la stessa cella; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
